name: AJokeofToday
0:
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
A Joke of Today flash briefings are a daily dose of humor that will help you start your day with a smile. Each briefing features a new joke, funny story, or humorous quote. I've hand-picked the best jokes from around the web, so you can be sure that you're getting the funniest content possible.

A Joke of Today flash briefings are family-friendly, so you can listen to them with your kids. I also try to keep my jokes clean and appropriate for all audiences.

If you're looking for a way to start your day with a laugh, then My Joke of Today flash briefings are the perfect solution. Just ask Alexa to "enable A Joke of Today" and you'll be all set.

I hope you enjoy A Joke of Today flash briefings!
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
